Articles.Content: Have you seen any inactive members? How long have they been inactive for. No need for their name, just how long since they've been active last. I personally  have seen a guy who has been here since 2012 with no posts, no reputation, no nothing. Last was seen in Sept 2012.

This game won't last long. But theoretically there is an account that is as old as June 2012 when the forums where made. The only way how we will ever know is if someone who has the ability to reveals it. 

So Sept 2012 is pretty close to the oldest you can get.
I’ve seen a whole bunch of these. Almost seems like missed opportunities. I envision this as a depressing thread.

1 minute ago, Fraston said:

I’ve seen a whole bunch of these. Almost seems like missed opportunities. I envision this as a depressing thread.

I am trying not to make it that.

7 minutes ago, The Doodling Astronaut said:

This game won't last long. But theoretically there is an account that is as old as June 2012 when the forums where made. The only way how we will ever know is if someone who has the ability to reveals it. 

So Sept 2012 is pretty close to the oldest you can get.

Yeah, but innactive so, hasn't been on in a while.
